description.en: Sphynx aims to provide an AIO (All-In-One) solution for trading, farming, staking and holding. The amount of trading, staking and farming platforms out there can be overwhelming and difficult to navigate.This creates a massive barrier to entry for those new to the world of crypto trading.Sphynx has taken it upon themselves to make this experience simpler, smoother and faster by wrapping everything a trader needs into one platform. So instead of swapping between 5 different platforms to manage and grow one's portfolio, Sphynx gives traders and hodlers alike the ability to remain on one and rule above them all!
